name: Tsunomaki Janken! - Boss Battle
description:
A Hololive Fan-game by swamp_kun!  Inspired by the popular Watame no Uta segment, Tsunomaki Janken! 

Are you a pro enough gamer to defeat the GOD of rock paper scissors? Comment your high scores bellow! 

Subscribe to Tsunomaki Watame

You can also follow me on twitter at twitter.com/swamp_kun

Having a hard time? Here's a hint:

Hint AHer first throw is always a rock.Hint BLook for the arm that's out of syncHint CAt the later stages, the correct hand is the one with a slight jitter as it reaches the highest or lowest point of its float animation
